Miscellaneous

Saving builts into .schem files:

//copy
//schematic save [filename]
//schematic load [filename]
//paste

Kill every pigs/minecarts in the neighborhood:

/kill @e[type=minecraft:pig] /kill @e[type=minecart,r=5]

Summon minecart at coordinates:

/summon minecraft:minecart x y z

ðŸ¦„ Super horse:

/summon minecraft:horse ~ ~ ~ {Variant:515,SaddleItem:{id:saddle,Count:1},Tame:1,Health:100,Glowing:1,PersistenceRequired:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.armor",Base:100.0F},{Name:"generic.movement_speed",Base:.66F},{Name:"horse.jump_strength",Base:1.5F},{Name:"generic.armor_toughness",Base:20.0F},{Name:"generic.follow_range",Base:85.0F},{Name:"generic.max_health",Base:100F}]}
